text: Broadcast Channel: Major feature for sharing content with a large audience. Members can no longer send messages and start group calls. Classic Channels can be converted into Broadcast Channels, and vice versa.
Reader Mode in Channel: Display only the essentials and focus on what matters (see Channel Settings).
Dividers & Quotes: Improve your communications by adding visual separators & quoted text.
Reshare: Major feature allowing you to re-share your entire messages — including all items — to other Members or Channels. Only you can re-share your own messages.
Grant Access feature in Item Info: Quickly add eligible Channel Members who need access to a shared Item.
